welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bull Run, a charming town known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport is the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is dedicated to international flights and is connected to the main terminal by an underground walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves as a hub for domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal by a pedestrian bridge.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is the newest concourse at Washington Dulles International Airport and is primarily used by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'IAD Airport WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal, serving mainly regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The main terminal, serving most domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Montgomery County Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private flights and offers exclusive amenities for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
